The new youtube hast the cast icon. It works inmediately with iOS and android, I have both and it works perfect.I even see live TV shows with it. (streaming)The only thing I dind't like is the fact that I would like to see my hole phone screen on the TV screen, I mean, the Icons and so, but I couldn't, I expected that... but anyway, I love Chromecast, one of the best things I've bought this year.
